resources.string:
Toolbar title text is white but icons are black.

Icons used to be white in this theme:

ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark.ActionBar.

See notes in build.gradle to reproduce.
It works sometimes if you remove \'app:backgroundTint\' from layout (see R.layout.fab_sometimes_broken)

Making the changes to the build.gradle to fix issue #201851 makes notifications break.

Previously the generated PNGs would be used for the notification icon. To fix issue #201851 the PNGs are no longer generate which should be fine because we can wrap a vector in another drawable as shown in the headers above.

Unfortunately wrapping the vectors in a layer-list does not work for the notification as show by the buttons below (only #2 and #4 should work on pre-lollipop devices, #3 is and invalid drawable I believe [was throwing darts]).
